refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns string with all alphabetic characters converted to lowercase.
Note that 'alphabetic' is determined by the current locale. This means that in i.e. the default "C" locale, characters such as umlaut-A (Ä) will not be converted.

example.title: strtolower example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$str = "Mary Had A Little Lamb and She LOVED It So";
$str = strtolower($str);
print $str; # Prints mary had a little lamb and she loved it so
?>

refsect1.para: See also strtoupper, ucfirst, and ucwords.
